phrases: The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos,
the profession that everyone once dreamed about and admired
came into the limelight.
Heroes of justice fighting villains and saving people from distress.
Yes, this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
I will definitely become a hero and make money
and let my parents take it easy.
You are amazing, Deku.
I keep seeing more and more amazing sides to you.
During the cavalry battle, I thought it would be easier to team up with friends,
but now that I think about it, I might have been trying to rely on you.
That is why, when Iida said he would challenge you,
it actually made me feel a little embarrassed.
Uraraka...
Everyone is facing the future and trying their hardest.
That means we are all rivals, right?
That is why...
Let us meet in the finals!
Bakugo vs. Uraraka
The eighth and last match of the first round!
He was kind of famous in middle school!
This is not the face of a regular person!
From the hero course, it is Katsuki Bakugo!
Versus-
She is the one I am rooting for!
From the hero course, it is Ochaco Uraraka!
You are the one that makes things float, right, Round Face?
Round...?
If you are going to withdraw, do it now.
You will not get off with just an ouch.
Midoriya.
What was the strategy you were going to tell
Uraraka earlier for her to use against Bakugo?
It was not much, really.
Hero Analysis for the Future
Kacchan's strong.
In a real close combat fight, he has almost no openings,
and the more he moves, the more he sweats, making his Explosion Quirk stronger.
He can use the blasts from his explosions to move around in the air,
but if Uraraka touches Kacchan and uses her Quirk to make him float,
then she would have the upper hand.
That is why...
Eighth match, start!
Withdrawing is not a choice!
All right!
That is good.
Even if it is an accident, as long as she can touch him, she can make him float!
Bakugo will not want Uraraka to get close to him.
That is why Kacchan will not want to evade.
He will want to counterattack!
Then, die!
Kacchan...
You usually start with a big right swing.
Here!
Here...!
If I dodge here...!
Uraraka!
Did he blast her?
Even though you are fighting a girl, you have no mercy, do you, Bakugo?
This is no good.
Even if I knew about it, I could not react in time.
I will take care of you.
Do not underestimate me!
Oh, she made her jacket float and sent it over there?!
She did it in an instant, too!
If I make him float now-
He moved after he saw her?
With that reaction time, it does not matter if there is a smokescreen.
With Uraraka not being able to activate her Quirk unless she touches him,
she is at a disadvantage with Bakugo's reflexes.
Too slow!
Take this!
Ochaco...
I cannot watch!
Bakugo, do not tell me... your tastes run in that direction...
Not yet!
Uraraka keeps attacking without rest, but... this is...
Uraraka...
Her substitution earlier did not work, so she is getting desperate.
What an idiot.
Hey, should not you stop this?
Is not he going too far?
I cannot watch...
Hey!
How can you say you want to be a hero like that?!
If there is such a huge difference in your abilities,
then hurry up and send her out of bounds!
Stop bullying and playing with the poor girl!
Yeah!
Yeah!
There is booing from part of the crowd...
But honestly, I also feel the sa-
An elbow?!
What are ya doing?!
Was that a pro saying he is playing around?
How many years have you been a pro?
Huh?
If you are saying that with a straight face,
there is no point in you watching anymore, so go home!
Go home, and look into changing careers!
Mr. Aizawa...?
Bakugo is being careful because he is acknowledged the strength of his opponent
who has made it this far.
It is because he is doing everything he can to win
that he cannot go easy on her or let his guard down.
Not yet...
She is still...
It is about time...
I think...
Thanks,
Bakugo...
Huh?
It cannot be helped from where Bakugo is,
but it is embarrassing for a pro in the stands to start booing without noticing.
She kept her body low as she advanced,
concentrating Bakugo's attacks on the ground,
storing up weapons.
And then, she narrowed his field of vision with relentless attacks
to keep him from noticing.
I am going to win!
A meteor shower?
You should have noticed.
She had a desperate plan like that up her sleeve?
With this much debris,
whether he is evading or counterattacking,
there will definitely be an opening!
In that moment, I will get close to him with my secret move!
I will win!
I will win and be like Deku, too!
Since you are friends with Deku,
I thought you would be up to something...
In one shot...
B-Bakugo delivers a satisfying explosion!
He blasts boldly through Uraraka's secret plan!
That was close...
I did as much as I could...!
But he was not fazed at all...
Uraraka...
Even so...
All right, let us get serious then, Uraraka!
If it were Deku...
Uraraka's down!
My... body... will not do... what I want...
Uraraka...
She passed her limit a long time ago...
I-I also...
When I get big, I will help you and Mommy!
I appreciate the thought, Ochaco.
But as your dad, I would be even happier if you could achieve your dream.
When that happens, you can take us to Hawaii!
I will become... a hero...!
Daddy...
Uraraka's out of commission.
Bakugo advances to the second round!
Katsuki Bakugo
Take her to Recovery Girl.
I know.
The eighth match of the first round...
Oh, Uraraka...
Oh yeah, Bakugo advances to the second round.
If you are going to do it, do it properly.
Now, let us pull ourselves together-
You are really letting your personal feelings take over...
The first round is all done!
Let us move on to the next round quickly after a short break!
Player Waiting Room 2
Let us meet in the finals!
Uraraka...
Whoa, Kacchan?
What the-?!
What the hell do you want?!
Die, scum!
Oh, well, I am next, so...
I was going to get ready in the waiting room...
Also, congrats on winning the first round...
Later...
That was your idea, was not it?
That damned desperate plan.
You just have to be annoying, do not you?
What the hell-
It was not.
All of it...
Uraraka planned it all thinking about how she could beat you.
If you thought that was annoying, that was because...
Hey, Bakugo!
That was tough, huh?
Playing the bad guy.
Even if it was because of the match-up, you played an amazing villain, Bakugo.
Shut up!
Be quiet!
But man, I cannot believe you were able to aim such a huge blast at a frail girl.
I could not help but hold back.
She completely sealed you off, Kaminari.
Y-You know what, Tsu...
What part of her was frail?
Player Waiting Room 2
Man, I lost...
Huh...?
I got carried away at the end thinking I could do it, dang it.
Uraraka, what about your injuries?
Are you okay?
Yeah, Recovery Girl took care of me!
It was only moderate healing so it would not drain my stamina,
so I have still got scratches and stuff, though.
Man, but that Bakugo was really strong!
Frustrated
He totally got me.
I need to work harder, too!
Are you... all right?
I am fine!
Better than expected!
Daddy
I mean, you immediately started looking ahead, Deku,
and just because I lost does not mean I can lose.
That is...
The draw from the seventh match of the first round, Kirishima and Tetsutetsu!
The winner of their arm wrestling match to decide who advances to the second round is...
Winner, Kirishima!
He advances to the second round!
-The one who won his ticket was Kirishima!
My metal fatigue...
I should have eaten more iron...!
It... was a good match.
S-So youthful!
Now we have got everyone who is advancing to the second round!
So, let us get started!
Already?
Later...
Oh, sorry Deku!
You were not able to prepare at all since I was here...
No, I am fine.
I will be watching,'kay?
Good luck.
Thanks.
Sorry about not picking up earlier, Daddy.
It is fine, sorry for calling when you are busy.
Your mom and I watched you on TV.
You were so close!
But you were amazing!
It was not that close.
And I was not amazing.
I rushed too much in the end, too.
I did not have a plan for what to do after that, either.
I was completely beaten.
Is that so?
I do not understand complicated things,
but just because you lost does not mean your path's been closed off, right?
There is always next year, right?
The further you advance,
the more you can show how well you do against different types.
The scouts cannot tell with just one match.
What are you in such a hurry for?
I mean...
I want to hurry and help you guys...
Ochaco, it is fine even if you do not rush.
You feeling that way shows you are kind,
so I know you will be a great hero.
Is not it obvious?
There is no way she is not frustrated.
Even so, I cannot believe I said that I could help...
I could not do anything for her...
Instead...
I will be watching,'kay?
Good luck.
Endeavor?!
Oh, there you are.
Endeavor...
What are you doing here...?
I watched your fight.
You have a wonderful Quirk.
You created so much wind pressure just by flicking your fingers.
If we are talking about power alone,
yours is comparable to All Might's.
Wh-What are you...
What are you trying to say?
I must go.
Endeavor knows about One For All?
No, from the way he talked, he does not know.
Anyway, this is the one person I cannot let find out.
It is my Shoto's duty to surpass All Might.
His match with you will be a very instructive test bed.
Please do not disgrace yourself in it.
Without using my damn old man's Quirk...
No...
I will reject him completely by winning first place without using it.
That was all I wanted to say.
I apologize for bothering you right before the match.
That is obviou-
That is obvious, right?
Todoroki is not you, either.
All Might has his eye on you, does not he?
Todoroki...
It is my Shoto's duty to surpass All Might.
Midoriya...
Just remember this-
I will make that into a hero that will surpass you one day.
Those two have not started yet?
I have got to watch.
Were your eyes hurt?
You must hurry to Recovery Girl-
I already went.
This is, you know...
It is different.
It is different?
If that is the case, then you must have been really frustrated earlier.
Rather than feeling regretful right now,
you should use this next match as a source of encouragement.
Yeah.
That is true.
Thanks for waiting, everybody!
The first match of the second round is a big match!
The man who won a huge victory in the first round and literally left the audience frozen-
From the hero course, it is Shoto Todoroki!
On the other hand, this guy barely made it past the first round!
What kind of fight will he show us this time?
From the hero course, it is Izuku Midoriya!
So you are here.
Todoroki...
Tokoyami, what do you think of this match?
It depends on whether or not Midoriya jumps in close to Todoroki.
Yeah.
What is Deku going to do about that ice?
Watch carefully and prepare, Tomura Shigaraki.
They may become obstacles to you one day.
That is a load of crap.
Izuku...
Authorized Personnel Only
Those two both tried to save you, did not they?
Yeah.
It is just a feeling, but I think those two...
At this year's sports festival,
both have shown top class performances!
It is like two great rivals fighting against each other!
Now-
Midoriya versus Todoroki!
Start!
Preview
Here is the preview.
The battle between Todoroki and me is finally starting.
I will end this quickly.
It is true that just Todoroki's ice from his right side is strong-
I told you.
I will win without using that man's Quirk and reject him completely.
I am your opponent!
What?
Next time, Shoto Todoroki: Origin.
He remembers words that he had forgotten once before.
Next time: Shoto Todoroki: Origin
Go beyond!
Plus Ultra!
